Cooper Brown

Drake University student and backend programmer

Who am I?

I am a Drake University student double majoring in computer science and artificial intelligence with a Leadership Education and Development (LEAD) minor. I am extremely committed and never afraid of tackling difficult challenges.

My Current Project: MIPY

An emulator for the MIPS assembly language written in python, I decided to do this project to learn more about MIPS and Python. This project features full testing with pytest.

Mellon Lime

A simple text editor with code syntax highlighting built with C# and WPF, called MelonLime. The download page is here

CRF-Planner

A Lightweight planner for Windows desktops built with C# and WPF. This project has been released! Version 1.0 can be found Here

Course Registration Helper

This was a project where I worked with a team of 12 developers to create a registration helper desktop app. Python was the primary language used. I was the leader in charge of the Degree Progress group, where users could track their courses and have the application recommend courses to take next.

Linkedin Scraper

A LinkedIn scraper to allow me to read LinkedIn pages easier for my VoteSmart.org internship. Built using Python using Selenium and Beautiful Soup

Where am I?
